page.title: 10Recreational Activities.
page.content: If you lived in Whitchurch and felt bored you could always join one of the many clubs and societies that there are in the town. If you are interested in acting then you join the Whitchurch Amateur Dramatic Society or WADS for short.They put on two or three productions every year and they are well supported. You could join the Cage Bird Society,the Horticultural Society,or the Keep Fit Club.These are just a few of the many clubs that there are in the town. During the winter months there are courses held at the Whitchurch Centre where you learn new skills or learn about things of interest.
